text: Grozny () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Kirovskoye Rural Settlement of Maykopsky District, Russia. The population was 400 as of 2018. There are 2 streets. == References == Category:Rural localities in Maykopsky District
title: Grozny, Kirovskoye Rural Settlement, Maykopsky District, Republic of Adygea
